attributes.action: Uniform Taxes for our Armed Forced
attributes.additional_details:
Under current HM Treasury Law, anyone who wears a uniform to work is able to claim a rebate helping them towards the cost of cleaning that uniform. Further details can be found at http://www.uniformtax.net

However this rule unfortunately does not apply to our Armed Forces. Even though they are responsible for maintenance and care of their uniform.

We would like the Uniform tax rebate scheme to be amended to include armed forces.
